author: Stereogum
title: Juggalos’ March On Washington Is No Longer The Protest America Needs
text: In 2011, the FBI's National Gang Intelligence Center released a report classifying Juggalos, fans of the infamous clown-themed hip-hop duo Insane Clown Posse, as a "loosely organized hybrid gang." According to Juggalos, Juggalos have been unfairly targeted and discriminated against ever since, and starting last July, ICP have been organizing a massive Juggalos' March On … More »
